educator.label: Educator / Teacher
educator.description: Explains concepts, teaches skills, breaks things into steps.
educator.tagline: Turn know-how into clear, actionable lessons.
educator.fullDescription: You thrive at explaining, simplifying, and helping people make real progress. Your content compounds as evergreen value.

entertainer.label: Entertainer / Performer
entertainer.tagline: Capture attention with humor, story, and energy.
entertainer.fullDescription: You shine on camera and love making people feel something—laughs, thrills, or surprise. Great fit for trends and rapid iteration.

lifestyle.label: Lifestyle & Inspiration
lifestyle.description: Daily routines, fashion, wellness, motivation, travel.
lifestyle.tagline: Make your habits and taste the brand.
lifestyle.fullDescription: You inspire through routines, aesthetics, and personal stories. Your personality is the product—show, don't tell.

reviewer.label: Reviewer / Analyst
reviewer.description: Unboxings, comparisons, deep dives, opinions with evidence.
reviewer.tagline: Help people decide with honest breakdowns.
reviewer.fullDescription: You love testing, comparing, and forming opinions backed by evidence. Trust is your growth engine.

journey.label: Journey / Documenter
journey.description: Build in public, progress logs, behind-the-scenes.
journey.tagline: Bring people along as you learn and build.
journey.fullDescription: You share the real process—wins and stumbles. Authenticity and consistency turn long arcs into loyal communities.
